Guardian:Gem_Red.NAME: Ruby
Guardian:Gem_Red.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Gain 2 Strength for this turn.

Guardian:Gem_Green.NAME: Emerald
Guardian:Gem_Green.DESCRIPTION: Gem. NL Gain 2 Dexterity for this turn.

Guardian:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
Guardian:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: On your next turn, gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:DonusPower.NAME: Ancient Power
Guardian:DonusPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:DonusPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:DecasProtection.NAME: Ancient Protection
Guardian:DecasProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:DecasProtection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PolyBeam.NAME: Poly Beam
Guardian:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !GuardianMulti! times. NL Set this card's cost to 2, then place it into Stasis.

Guardian:CurlUp.NAME: Curl Up
Guardian:CurlUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block !GuardianMulti! times. NL Enter Defensive Mode.

Guardian:ExploderProtocol.NAME: Exploder Protocol
Guardian:ExploderProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Summon Bronze Orb. NL In 3 turns, your Bronze Orb will explode, dealing !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Guardian:SpikerProtocol.NAME: Spiker Protocol
Guardian:SpikerProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Summon Bronze Orb. NL Your Bronze Orb attacks a random enemy for !GuardianSecondM! damage each turn, and deals !M! damage to attackers.

Guardian:RepulsorProtocol.NAME: Repulsor Protocol
Guardian:RepulsorProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Summon Bronze Orb. NL Your Bronze Orb attacks a random enemy for !GuardianSecondM! damage and applies !M! Weak each turn.

Guardian:GuardProtocol.NAME: Guard Protocol
Guardian:GuardProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Summon Bronze Orb. NL Your Bronze Orb grants you !M! Block each turn.

Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.NAME: Hyper Beam
Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Skip your next turn.

Guardian:FloatingOrbs.NAME: Floating Orbs
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an Orb Slam to your hand.
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add an Orb Slam to your hand.

Guardian:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
Guardian:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus an additional !M! damage every turn this combat.

Guardian:Orbwalk.NAME: Orbwalk
Guardian:Orbwalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength at the start of each turn.

Guardian:SphericShield.NAME: Spheric Shield
Guardian:SphericShield.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your turn. NL Enter Defensive Mode.

Guardian:SentryBeam.NAME: Sentry Beam
Guardian:SentryBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Place a Sentry Wave into Stasis with this card's Gems.

Guardian:SentryWave.NAME: Sentry Wave
Guardian:SentryWave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Place a Sentry Beam into Stasis with this card's Gems.

Guardian:CompilePackage.NAME: Compile Package
Guardian:CompilePackage.DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three Packages to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:CompilePackage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one of three Packages to add to your hand. The cards the Package adds will all be Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageShapes.NAME: Package: Shapes
Guardian:PackageShapes.DESCRIPTION: Add an Exploder Protocol, Spiker Protocol, and Repulsor Protocol to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageShapes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Exploder Protocol, Spiker Protocol, and Repulsor Protocol to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.NAME: Package: Ancients
Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.DESCRIPTION: Add an Ancient Power, Ancient Protection, and Poly Beam to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageDonuDeca.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Ancient Power, Ancient Protection, and Poly Beam to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSphere.NAME: Package: Spheric
Guardian:PackageSphere.DESCRIPTION: Add a Spheric Shield, Harden, and Floating Orbs to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageSphere.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Spheric Shield, Harden, and Floating Orbs to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSentry.NAME: Package: Sentry
Guardian:PackageSentry.DESCRIPTION: Add a Sentry Beam and two Sentry Waves to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageSentry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Sentry Beam and two Sentry Waves to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageWalker.NAME: Package: Orbwalker
Guardian:PackageWalker.DESCRIPTION: Add an Orbwalk, Walker Claw, and Incinerate to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageWalker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Orbwalk, Walker Claw, and Incinerate to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageAutomaton.NAME: Package: Automaton
Guardian:PackageAutomaton.DESCRIPTION: Add a Hyper Beam, Guard Protocol, and Bronze Armor to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:PackageAutomaton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Hyper Beam, Guard Protocol, and Bronze Armor to your hand, each of which is Upgraded. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Planning.NAME: Planning
Guardian:Planning.DESCRIPTION: Place the top !M! cards of your draw pile into Stasis.

Guardian:Recover.NAME: Recover
Guardian:Recover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a card from your discard pile into Stasis.
Guardian:Recover.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place up to !M! cards from your discard pile into Stasis.

Guardian:Emergency.NAME: Emergency
Guardian:Emergency.DESCRIPTION: Return all cards in Stasis to your hand.

Guardian:Clone.NAME: Clone
Guardian:Clone.DESCRIPTION: Place a copy of the next card you play into Stasis.
Guardian:Clone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place copies of the next 2 cards you play into Stasis.

Guardian:Preprogram.NAME: Preprogram
Guardian:Preprogram.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. You may choose one to place into Stasis.

Guardian:GemFinder.NAME: Gem Finder
Guardian:GemFinder.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, choose a Gem to add to your deck.

Guardian:StasisField.NAME: Stasis Field
Guardian:StasisField.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Place a 2-cost copy of this card into Stasis.

Guardian:StasisStrike.NAME: Stasis Strike
Guardian:StasisStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Place a 2-cost copy of this card into Stasis.

Guardian:FuturePlans.NAME: Future Plans
Guardian:FuturePlans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, place up to !M! card in your hand in Stasis.
Guardian:FuturePlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, place up to !M! card in your hand in Stasis.

Guardian:Suspension.NAME: Suspension
Guardian:Suspension.DESCRIPTION: Place up to X cards in your hand into Stasis.
Guardian:Suspension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place up to X+1 cards in your hand into Stasis.

Guardian:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
Guardian:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all cards in Stasis by 1. NL If any cards in Stasis cost 0, return them to your hand.

Guardian:SyncronizedStrike.NAME: Syncronized Strike
Guardian:SyncronizedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have a Bronze Orb, heal !M! of its HP, then trigger its attack.

Guardian:ConstructionForm.NAME: Construction Form
Guardian:ConstructionForm.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, you cannot lose HP or play Attacks.

Guardian:BlastProtocol.NAME: Blast Protocol
Guardian:BlastProtocol.DESCRIPTION: Summon Bronze Orb. NL Your Bronze Orb attacks a random enemy for !M! damage each turn.

Guardian:MultiBoost.NAME: MultiBoost
Guardian:MultiBoost.DESCRIPTION: Attacks that deal damage multiple times do so an additional time.

Guardian:WeakpointTargeting.NAME: Spot Weakpoint
Guardian:WeakpointTargeting.DESCRIPTION: Each time the enemy takes damage this combat, gain 1 Strength for the turn.

Guardian:RollAttack.NAME: Roll Attack
Guardian:RollAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage if you are in Defensive Mode.

Guardian:GemFire.NAME: Gem Cannon
Guardian:GemFire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand with Gems in them. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Gem in those cards.

Guardian:Reroute.NAME: Reroute
Guardian:Reroute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place the next Attack or Skill you play this turn into Stasis.

Guardian:PiercingHide.NAME: Piercing Hide
Guardian:PiercingHide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Thorns for this turn. NL Enter Defensive Mode.

Guardian:SharpenScales.NAME: Sharpen Scales
Guardian:SharpenScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Thorns for this turn if you are in Defensive Mode.

Guardian:PrismaticBeam.NAME: Prismatic Beam
Guardian:PrismaticBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then repeat for each Gem in this card.

Guardian:PrismaticBarrier.NAME: Prismatic Barrier
Guardian:PrismaticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then repeat for each Gem in this card.

Guardian:TemporalStrike.NAME: Temporal Strike
Guardian:TemporalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Damage is increased by !M! for each card in Stasis.

Guardian:TemporalShield.NAME: Temporal Shield
Guardian:TemporalShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Block is increased by !M! for each card in Stasis.

Guardian:ExploitGems.NAME: Exploit Gems
Guardian:ExploitGems.DESCRIPTION: Perform the following X times: NL Gain [E].
Guardian:ExploitGems.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Perform the following X+1 times: NL Gain [E].

Guardian:CallForBackup.NAME: Call for Backup
Guardian:CallForBackup.DESCRIPTION: Add X random Protocol cards to your hand. They cost 0. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:CallForBackup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X random Upgraded Protocol cards to your hand. They cost 0. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:RefractedBeam.NAME: Refracted Beam
Guardian:RefractedBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

Guardian:MultiBeam.NAME: Multi-Beam
Guardian:MultiBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Play a random Beam card from your draw pile.

Guardian:BaubleBeam.NAME: Bauble Beam
Guardian:BaubleBeam.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each Gem in this card. NL Deal !D! damage.

Guardian:PrimingBeam.NAME: Priming Beam
Guardian:PrimingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage dealt by Beam cards by !M! this combat.

Guardian:SlickScales.NAME: Slick Scales
Guardian:SlickScales.DESCRIPTION: While in Defensive Mode, gain !M! Dexterity. NL Enter Defensive Mode.

Guardian:SpikyScales.NAME: Spiky Scales
Guardian:SpikyScales.DESCRIPTION: While in Defensive Mode, gain !M! Thorns. NL Enter Defensive Mode.

Guardian:ArmoredScales.NAME: Armored Scales
Guardian:ArmoredScales.DESCRIPTION: While in Defensive Mode, gain !M! Block at the end of each turn. NL Enter Defensive Mode.

Guardian:Automayhem.NAME: Automayhem
Guardian:Automayhem.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, place a random 1-cost card into Stasis.

Guardian:Construct.NAME: Ancient Construct
Guardian:Construct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL When you lose an Artifact, gain 1 Strength.

Guardian:CrystalBeam.NAME: Crystal Beam
Guardian:CrystalBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is increased by !M! for each Gem in ALL of your socketed cards.
